lead_paragraph: Regulators have said the rejection shows the bank has not figured out how to adequately unwind the complex and interconnected parts of its operations.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Crisis Plan for Bank Is Lacking
headline.main: Wells Fargo’s ‘Living Will’ Plan Is Rejected Again by Regulators

snippet: Regulators have said the rejection shows the bank has not figured out how to adequately unwind the complex and interconnected parts of its operations....
abstract: Regulators, for second time, reject Wells Fargo 'living will' disaster-preparedness plan to safeguard economy in case of bank's failure, asserting proposal is not adequate enough; bank will be prohibited from establishing new international units or buying subsidiary unless it fixes its plan by March 2017.
